name: Default Duelyst Board
spawn_positions: Player 1: (0,2) or nearby; Player 2: (8,2) or nearby
description: Standard Duelyst board with 9 columns and 5 rows. Center position is (4,2). Mana tiles spawn at 3 predefined locations at game start.

name: Challenge Board
description: Custom board used in challenge mode. Starts completely empty except for generals, which are positioned according to challenge requirements.
